PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The PCE level is the highest reported to date in the side - chain D-A conjugated copolymersbased single BHJ PSCs , which is twice higher than that of the corresponding main - chain D-A polymer - based ones.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE level |
| Twice higher |

The Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE level
2. Twice higher

The phrase "twice higher" is a comparison of the PCE level of the side-chain D-A conjugated copolymersbased single BHJ PSCs to that of the corresponding main-chain D-A polymer-based ones, and it is describing the property value of the former being twice that of the latter. Therefore, it is a Property Value entity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid Property Value entities:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE level |

The only valid Property Value entity in the paragraph is "PCE level", which refers to the highest reported value of the photovoltaic conversion efficiency (PCE) of the side-chain D-A conjugated copolymersbased single BHJ PSCs. The phrase "twice higher" is not a direct reference to a material property value, but rather a comparison of the PCE level of the side-chain D-A conjugated copolymersbased single BHJ PSCs to that of the main-chain D-A polymer-based ones. Therefore, it is not a valid Property Value entity in this context.
